develop_countermeasures.title: Technical Solutions
develop_countermeasures.description: Chief Technician Zara pulls up engineering schematics: 'If we can't stop the interference at its source, we can adapt our systems to work around it. New filtering algorithms, backup navigation methods, redundant communication channels. It'll take time and resources, but we can make our network interference-resistant.'

choices.text: 'How long would these modifications take to implement?'
'What resources do you need to get started immediately?'
'We should still find and stop the interference source.'
'These countermeasures might help with other crisis situations too.'
